Languages: Common, Understands all languages it knew in life but cannot speak

Traits.Name: Evasive Flicker
Traits.Content: The Urban Wraith's ghostly silhouette makes it difficult to pin down. It has advantage on Dexterity saving throws and is treated as having three-quarters cover against ranged attacks.

Traits.Name: Surveillance Loop
Traits.Content: The Urban Wraith can remain hidden even in plain sight, often making it appear as if it is stuck in a repetitive loop. Invisible to non-magical detect effects, it can stealthily observe without being detected.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Urban Wraith makes four attacks: one with Ethereal Touch and three with Frightening Grasp.

Actions.Name: Ethereal Touch
Actions.Content: Melee Spell Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) necrotic damage. The target must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn as it feels the chilling grasp of the afterlife.

Actions.Name: Frightening Grasp
Actions.Content: Melee Spell Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) necrotic damage. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take an additional 5 (1d10) necrotic damage as the wraith corrupts their essence.

Actions.Name: Temporal Disruption
Actions.Content: The Urban Wraith flickers in and out of reality, creating an abrupt time warp. Each creature within a 15-foot radius must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 30 (4d12 + 4) psychic damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a success, they take half damage and are not incapacitated. This action can be used once per short rest.
